languages.text: Покойника прикончили серией точных порезов в уязвимых местах — горло, глаза, сухожилия. Стиль убийцы явно подразумевал, что первые же удары должны решить исход боя.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк при успехе изучения трупа (зацепка для букэвента).

languages.text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.
languages.original_text: Покойника прикончили серией точных порезов в уязвимых местах — горло, глаза, сухожилия. Стиль убийцы явно подразумевал, что первые же удары должны решить исход боя.

traits.locale_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to decide the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

languages.text: 犠牲者は、喉、目、腱といった傷つきやすい箇所を何度も正確に切りつけられた。殺した者はは最初の数発で戦いの流れを左右することを狙ったに違いない。
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: 犠牲者は、喉、目、腱といった傷つきやすい箇所を何度も正確に切りつけられた。殺した者はは最初の数発で戦いの流れを左右することを狙ったに違いない。

languages.text: 死者被一系列精准的刀伤命中了关键部位，咽喉，眼睛与肌腱都带着刀痕。凶手肯定是打算几刀结束这场战斗。
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: 死者被一系列精准的刀伤命中了关键部位，咽喉，眼睛与肌腱都带着刀痕。凶手肯定是打算几刀结束这场战斗。

languages.text: La víctima fue asesinada mediante una serie de cortes precisos en puntos vulnerables: la garganta, los ojos y los tendones. El asesino quería determinar el resultado de la pelea con los primeros golpes.
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: La víctima fue asesinada mediante una serie de cortes precisos en puntos vulnerables: la garganta, los ojos y los tendones. El asesino quería determinar el resultado de la pelea con los primeros golpes.

languages.text: Das Opfer wurde durch eine Reihe präziser Schnitte an verletzlichen Stellen getötet: an der Kehle, den Augen und den Sehnen. Der Mörder wollte den Ausgang des Kampfs wohl schon durch die ersten paar Hiebe entscheiden.
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: Das Opfer wurde durch eine Reihe präziser Schnitte an verletzlichen Stellen getötet: an der Kehle, den Augen und den Sehnen. Der Mörder wollte den Ausgang des Kampfs wohl schon durch die ersten paar Hiebe entscheiden.

languages.text: La victime a été tuée par une série de coups précis portés aux points faibles : la gorge, les yeux et les tendons. L'assassin a visiblement tout donné pour faire en sorte que le combat tourne en sa faveur dès le début.
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: La victime a été tuée par une série de coups précis portés aux points faibles : la gorge, les yeux et les tendons. L'assassin a visiblement tout donné pour faire en sorte que le combat tourne en sa faveur dès le début.

languages.text: Kurban; boynu, gözleri ve tendonları gibi savunmasız bölgelerine aldığı muntazam kesikler yüzünden ölmüş. Katil, daha ilk birkaç darbede zaferini garantilemek istemiş olmalı.
languages.original_text: The victim was killed by a series of precise cuts in vulnerable spots: the throat, the eyes, and the tendons. The killer must have been aiming to swing the outcome of the fight with the first few blows.

traits.locale_text: Kurban; boynu, gözleri ve tendonları gibi savunmasız bölgelerine aldığı muntazam kesikler yüzünden ölmüş. Katil, ilk birkaç darbesiyle mücadele ihtimalinin sonuçlarını ortadan kaldırmak istemiş olmalı.
